text: (visvasavantayin vana) ovunta ek paricchedayak pahala karanu læba, eya tamange hrdayanhi æti dæya elidarav kara harivido yayi vamcanikayin biya (vannan men rangapa samaccal) karannaha. (nabiye! ovunta) oba mese kiyanu: “oba samaccal karaminma sitinu. ehet oba biya vana dæya niyata vasayenma allah anivayadæyenma elidarav karanneya”
